name: Facebook - Remove Ads & Expand
description:
Most of the "Remove Ads" skins for Facebook are out of date so I'll do my best to keep this on top.

Accurate as of: 13 Feb 2010

Removes all Facebook ads (and "Sponsored" from the front page) AND stretches all pages out to fit the new width so you aren't left with a giant empty box instead of the ads.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you don't like recent changes to Facebook's skin try this: http://userstyles.org/styles/17028
